title: Yume To Koi Dewa Tsuriawanai
alternative_title: 夢と恋ではつり合わない ; 꿈과 사랑은 어울리지 않아 ; Love and Dreams Don't Mix ; Cinta dan Impian Itu Tidak Bisa Digabung
status: 夢と恋ではつり合わない ; 꿈과 사랑은 어울리지 않아 ; Love and Dreams Don't Mix ; Cinta dan Impian Itu Tidak Bisa Digabung
description:
Description :
        Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 1: I Love You, Please Reject Me!
